info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 6:15AM EDT until July 28 at 6:45AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cass County in southwestern Michigan... Southeastern Berrien County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 645 AM EDT. * At 615 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Buchanan, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Niles, Dowagiac, Buchanan, Berrien Springs, Cassopolis, Edwardsburg, Bertrand, Pokagon, Dayton, Baroda, Eau Claire, Galien, Glendora, Dailey, La Grange, Barron Lake, Sumnerville, and Indian Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
